title: This game is total nonsense
body: Everyweek when new free champ rotation is on my game crashes when ı try to enter and wants me to reinstall ı already downloaded and reinstalled like 50 times seriously ? And today when ı was going to play a ranked game,game just crashed and said some files were not updated so ı quit and waited for them to be updated but in the meantime the game was over and ı got busted for 10 games yeah great!

replies.body: It sounds like your game files are becoming corrupt somehow after the patcher updates.  I suggest downloading our  [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help!  There will be an option to automatically provide a clean reinstall, which will give you a fresh, clean slate.  That should help!
